#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(){
        int t,k,i;
        char str[101];
        int count=0;
        cin >> t;
 
        getchar();
        while(t--){
                gets(str);
                count=0;
 
                for(i=0; i< strlen(str); i++){
                         if(str[i]=='A'||str[i]=='D'||str[i]=='O'||str[i]=='P'||str[i]=='R'||str[i]=='Q'){
                        count = count+1;}
                        else if( str[i]=='B'){
                                count = count+2;
                        }
                }
                cout << count << endl;
 
        }
        return 0;
}
